_source: speak;Narrator;Ephraim leads the group to Za'albul Marsh in search of the missing Myrrh.|They learn from soldiers and villagers that Myrrh had been captured by General Selena, one of Grado's commanders.|She was last seen heading east.|To regain their companion, the group will now be forced to fight.
speak;Narrator;Ephraim steels his heart to the reality that he must face Selena.
